content.text: Hey cousin! How are you? I hope you are doing well. My parents told me you will come this summer! I can't wait to see you. We will go to all the fun places we can see in our city. Next month, when you get here, I'll take you to the stadium because there is a great hockey game happening. The weekend after that we could go to the cinema if you want. Will you go with me? I also need to do some boring stuff like going to the bank, but we'll have to take the bus for that and from the bus stop to the bank we can see many beautiful places. My mom will make us go to the supermarket with her, but she promised to buy our favorite snacks. Let me know what day you will be here!
